contentrichtext.text: '''Neudorf''' (German for "new village") may refer to: ==In Austria== *[[Neudorf bei Staatz]], in the district of Mistelbach, Lower Austria *[[Wiener Neudorf]], in the district of Mödling, Lower Austria *[[Neudorf bei Parndorf]], in Burgenland *[[Neudorf bei Passail]], in Styria *A locality of [[Graz Liebenau]] ==In Germany== *[[Neudorf (Wächtersbach)]], a village in [[Wächtersbach]], Hesse *[[Neudorf (Duisburg)]], a locality of [[Duisburg]] *[[Neudorf, Saxony-Anhalt]], a town in the district of Harz in Saxony-Anhalt *A locality of [[Amorbach]] in northern Bavaria *[[Pegnitz-Neudorf]], a locality of [[Pegnitz (city)|Pegnitz]] in northern Bavaria *[[Graben-Neudorf]], a town in the district of Karlsruhe in Baden-Württemberg *[[Neudorf-Bornstein]], a municipality in Schleswig-Holstein ==In Romania== *Neudorf, a village in [[Zăbrani]] Commune, Arad County *''Neudorf'', the German name for Ciceu-Corabia village, [[Ciceu-Mihăiești]] Commune, Bistriţa-Năsăud County *''Neudorf'', the German name for Nou Săsesc village, [[Laslea]] Commune, Sibiu County * ''Neudorf'', the German name for Nou village, [[Roșia, Sibiu|Roşia]] Commune, Sibiu County ==In Switzerland== *[[Neudorf LU]], in the Canton of Lucerne *[[Neudorf AG]], a locality of [[Uerkheim]] in the Canton of Aargau ==In Serbia== *Neudorf was the former name of the village currently named [[Banatsko Novo Selo]]. ==In France== *[[Neudorf (Strasbourg)]], a district in the south of [[Strasbourg]] *[[Neudorf, Moselle]], a village in the département of [[Moselle]] *[[Village-Neuf]], a commune in the [[Haut-Rhin]] département (part of the Base] urban area), formerly known as '''Neudorf''' in German ==In Russia== *Often spelled as ''[[Noidorf]]'' ({{lang-ru|Нойдорф}}) - industrial and business park in special economic zone in [[Strelna]] near Saint Petersburg, Russia *[[Karmanova]], Ukraine - Neudorf, South Russia (now Ukraine) was formed in 1809 by German immigrants ==In Canada== *[[Neudorf, Saskatchewan]] is a town located in the south east corner of the Canadian province of Saskatchewan ==In New Zealand== * [[Neudorf, Moutere]] region of Nelson was founded by German settlers in 1843. Felled native forest made way for traditional pastoral sheep farming and now includes award winning cheese making (Neudorf Dairy) and internationally acclaimed wines (Neudorf Vineyards). Only a 35 minute drive from Nelson, Neudorf lies in the shadow of the Kahurangi National Park. ==See also== * [[Novo Selo (disambiguation)]] {{disambig|geo}}
